parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>False. The post does not refer to any specific parliamentary candidate or party participating in the parliamentary elections.  It promotes the services of the Eurotrans Foundation related to assistance with obtaining Hungarian citizenship.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and its message is clearly intended to reach a wide audience in Harghita and Mureș counties, Romania, as indicated by the ad's targeting data.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>False. The objective of the post is not to influence the vote in the parliamentary elections. The post promotes the services of the Eurotrans Foundation, which assists people in obtaining Hungarian citizenship. While this might indirectly relate to political issues, it does not directly advocate for or against any candidate or party in the parliamentary elections.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post is not journalistic in nature. It's an advertisement for the services of an organization.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>Not applicable. The post does not express a personal opinion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1095337025644908</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes the services of the Eurotrans Foundation, which assists people in obtaining Hungarian citizenship.  The post does not mention any parliamentary candidates or parties, nor does it encourage voting for or against any specific candidate. The targeting is geographically limited to Harghita and Mureș counties. While the topic of citizenship might have indirect political implications, the post's primary purpose is to advertise the foundation's services, not to influence the parliamentary elections. Therefore, it does not meet the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006 and Article 98 t) of LEGE nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>FALSE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates/>
<responsible-party-or-group>Eurotrans Alapítvány</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police/>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
